title: Umm.. So there's this annoying bug
body:
I leveled up, I got a champ capsule, but my client just crashes when I try to open it, I tried it two times and then it crashed when I went to the loot, I didn't even press open anymore..
Hope it'll get looked into

replies.body:
If that's still happening, make sure you first try running the repair in the client options. It sounds like your client might have some damaged or missing files pertaining to loot, so running that repair would be a great start. Let me know if that doesn't seem to help, we might need to move onto a reinstall if not.

I'd also go ahead and slap that bug report button in the bottom right hand corner of the client if this continues!
